content: the bell bomber is a lightweight bomber jacket or a heavier cardigan with a lace work back and front stripes that create stretch and visual interest this cardigan/shacket is great for all transitional weather as it is warm made of worsted yarn but has open lace areas that breathe this pattern is an advanced beginner friendly pattern made in rectangular body pieces seamed together then sleeves worked in rounds sizes included are from xs-4x and length is easily adjustable to change to a longer sweater or duster if desired this sweater requires 6 mm crochet hook #4 worsted weight yarn yarn needle approximate yardage xs 1000 yards s/m 1090 yards m/l 1200 yards xl/2x 1300 yards 3x 1400 yards 4x 1500 yards sizing is as follows xs s/m m/l xl/2x 3x 4x chest 28-30 32 36 38 42 44 -50 52 -54 56 -58 length 21 5 22 5 23 5 25 5 26 5 28 5 width 18 5 21 23 5 26 28 5 31 chest is actual body size width and length are for finished garment no reproductions of the pattern are allowed items made from the pattern are allowed to be sold as long as the pattern is credited please feel free do tag me on instagram using @harbourstitches
